<title level="2" right="Creature 8">[Kieragan Skross](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2176)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Crown of the Kobold King](/Sources.aspx?ID=148) pg. 105</row>

**Perception** +16; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Dwarven](/Languages.aspx?ID=3), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +18, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +16, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +18, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +16

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +2

**Con** +4

**Int** +0

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Items**
_+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [returning](/Equipment.aspx?ID=301) [light hammer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=29)_, defiled [religious symbol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41) of [Droskar](/Deities.aspx?ID=28)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 26 

**Fort** +18 

**Ref** +14 

**Will** +16 

</row>

**HP** 135
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Final Blasphemy** ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118)) When the herexen is destroyed, it explodes in a wave of negative energy with the effects of a 3-action, 4th-level [_harm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) spell (DC 26). The herexen is destroyed, so it doesn't gain any Hit Points from this use of _harm_, and it doesn't need to have any _harm_ spells remaining to use this ability.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_light hammer_ +19 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 2d6+9 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_light hammer_ +15 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 2d6+9 bludgeoning

**Divine Prepared Spells** DC 26, attack +18
- **4th**
[Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) (×4)

**Cleric Domain Spells** DC 20, 2 Focus Points
- **4th**
[Commanding Lash](/Spells.aspx?ID=408), [Touch of Obedience](/Spells.aspx?ID=459)

**Heretic's Smite**  ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) While wielding the favored weapon of its former deity (such as a dagger for an ex-Pharasmin herexen), the herexen's Strikes deal an additional 2d6 evil damage against creatures that can cast divine spells.

</column>
name: Kieragan Skross
